name: partialSups_add_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
ι : Type u_2
inst✝⁵ : SemilatticeSup α
inst✝⁴ : Add ι
inst✝³ : One ι
inst✝² : LinearOrder ι
inst✝¹ : LocallyFiniteOrderBot ι
inst✝ : SuccAddOrder ι
f : ι → α
i : ι
⊢ Eq ((partialSups f) (HAdd.hAdd i 1)) (Max.max ((partialSups f) i) (f (HAdd.hAdd i 1)))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma partialSups_add_one [Add ι] [One ι] [LinearOrder ι] [LocallyFiniteOrderBot ι] [SuccAddOrder ι]
    (f : ι → α) (i : ι) : partialSups f (i + 1) = partialSups f i ⊔ f (i + 1) :=
  Order.succ_eq_add_one i ▸ partialSups_succ f i
